posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ron Lambert
Dear All

I've been mulling over a sale of my approx 3/4 of a T207 set and thought I would throw it out here to gauge interest. At this juncture, I have no interest in selling any cards individually.

I believe that I have scans of almost every card available on the SGC website at the following link:

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=54&userset=1822[/url]

The only cards missing from the SGC site are Livingston small C, Austin w/Insignia and Fisher w/White Cap.

Overall 25 of the cards have a rare back with 12 being ANONYMOUS, 5 
BROADLEAF, 4 NAPOLEON, and 4 RED CYCLE.

Overall grade breakdown is as follows:

SGC 10: 3 cards 
SGC 20: 4 cards
SGC 30: 15 cards
SGC 40: 52 cards
SGC 50: 35 cards
SGC 60: 24 cards
SGC 70: 5 cards
SGC 80: 7 cards 
SGC A: 1 card  

If anyone wants a spreadsheet with the full breakdown, I'd be happy to provide it.

Regards

Ron

Posted By: MVSNYC
hi, i have an interest in all of your cards...your email link does not work for me on my home computer, do you mind listing your email here, so we can start a dialogue? thanks, MS
